name: dataframe
description: Python binding of the C++ dataframe

scripts.setup: pip3 install virtualenv && python3 -m venv project_env && source project_env/bin/activate
scripts.build: mkdirp ./build && cd build && cmake .. && make dataframe && mv *.so ../../bin/dataframe.so && cp ../../bin/*.so ../dataframe/ && cp ../../bin/*.dylib ../dataframe/

author: fmaerten@gmail.com
